explanation: To check for direct or indirect recursion starting from metal_run we must examine every function it calls and their transitive callees. metal_run directly calls metal_run_noblock and metal_finish_threads, so their definitions (and any functions they call) are required to determine whether there exists a call path back to metal_run. Other listed symbols (atomic, mutex, shmem, condition, spinlock) are callers of metal_run and therefore irrelevant to determining whether metal_run itself calls (directly or indirectly) back to metal_run.
